Hydrocarbons (Petrochemical and Natural Gas Industries)

Anaya Abogados offers consulting services during the development and structuring of investment projects in the hydrocarbons industry in Mexico, both for national and foreign companies. Our advice is focused on the granting of public biddings, the negotiation and execution of the contracts regarding the exploration, production and transportation on the oil and gas industries, as well as other related activities.
